articles.title: PH stays 'very low risk' with negative growth rate, low ADAR - pna.gov.ph
articles.description: MANILA – The Philippines remained at “very low risk” classification for Covid-19 while countries in East Asia are experiencing a surge in new cases, the OCTA Research Group said Sunday.In a tweet, OCTA Research Group Fellow Dr. Guido David said the country’s …
articles.content:
MANILA – The Philippines remained at “very low risk” classification for Covid-19 while countries in East Asia are experiencing a surge in new cases, the OCTA Research Group said Sunday.

articles.title: Recovered from Covid-19 but still have difficulty breathing? This doctor shares some useful exercises to try - AsiaOne
articles.description: As of late, it seems like everyone is contracting Covid-19 thanks to the more infectious Omicron variant. While some people manage to recover with little to no symptoms, others experience issues like difficulty in breathing and sleeping. If you too are facing…

articles.author: RNZ News
articles.title: Timor-Leste's Ramos-Horta makes pitch for stability ahead of election - amp.rnz.co.nz
articles.description: The frontrunner in Timor-Leste's presidential election, independence figure and Nobel laureate Jose Ramos-Horta, has said he hopes to restore political stability to Asia's youngest democracy, as the nation prepares to head to the polls.
